name: Cape of Conjuring
effect: Worn about the shoulders, this item increases the duration of all your spells by 3.

name: Dragon Wing Tabard
effect: Worn on the shoulders, this item increases hero's knowledge and power skills by +2.

name: Vampire's Cowl
effect: Worn about the shoulders, this cowl increases hero's necromancy skill by 10%
Worn about the shoulders, this item increases your magic resistance by 10%
Worn about the shoulders, the Ambassador's Sash reduces the cost of surrendering by 10%
When worn, this cloak increases kingdom's crystal production by +1 per day
While wearing this cloak, neither you nor your opponent will be able to cast level 3 or higher spells during combat
Worn about the shoulders, this cape increases the combat speed of all hero's creatures by +2
Worn about the shoulders, these wings allow you to fly

From dead allies, 30% are resurrected as skeletons. If a hero already has Necromancy secondary skill then the percentages are added to the skill and the level of skill determines what type is resurrected: basic – walking dead; advanced – wights; expert – liches
Worn on the feet, this item increases hero's knowledge and power skills by +1
Worn on the feet, these boots increase hero's movement rate over land
Worn on the feet, these boots increase your necromancy skill by 15%
Worn on the feet, these boots increase hero's magic resistance by 15%
Worn on the feet, the Sandals of the Saint increase all four primary skills by +2
When worn, these boots allow you to walk across water
Worn on the head, this item increases hero's knowledge skill by +1
Worn on the head, this item increases hero's knowledge skill by +2
Worn on the head, this item increases hero's knowledge skill by +3
Worn on the head, this item increases hero's knowledge skill by +4
Worn on the head, this item increases hero's knowledge skill by +5
Worn on the head, this item increases hero's knowledge and power skills by +4

name: Thunder Helmet
effect: When equipped, Thunder Helmet increases hero's knowledge skill by +10, but reduces hero's power skill by -2

name: Sea Captain's Hat
effect: When worn, this hat increases hero's movement at sea, allows you to summon and destroy boats, and protects you from whirlpools

name: Helm of Heavenly Enlightenment
effect: Worn on the head, the Helm of Heavenly Enlightenment increases all four primary skills by +6

name: Spellbinder's Hat
effect: When equipped, the hat enables hero to cast all 5th level spells

name: Admiral's Hat
effect: No boarding or unboarding ship penalty. Converts movement points between the hero's land and water movement

name: Shield of the Dwarven Lords
effect: This left handed item increases hero's defense skill by +2

name: Shield of the Yawning Dead
effect: This left handed item increases hero's defense skill by +3

name: Buckler of the Gnoll King
effect: This left handed item increases your Defense skill by +4

name: Targ of the Rampaging Ogre
effect: This left handed item increases hero's defense skill by +5

name: Shield of the Damned
effect: This left handed item increases hero's defense skill by +6

name: Dragon Scale Shield
effect: Held with the left hand, this item increases your attack and defense skills by +3

name: Lion's Shield of Courage
effect: Held with the left hand, the Lion's Shield of Courage increases all four primary skills by +4

name: Sentinel's Shield
effect: Held with the left hand, this relic increases hero's defense skill by +12, but reduces attack skill by -3

name: Charm of Mana
effect: This charm helps you recover 1 extra spell point per day

name: Talisman of Mana
effect: This talisman helps hero to recover 2 extra spell points per day

name: Mystic Orb of Mana
effect: This orb helps a hero to recover 3 extra spell points per day

name: Wizard's Well
effect: Regenerates all spell points each day

name: Orb of Silt
effect: This powerful orb causes hero's earth spells to inflict an additional 50% damage

name: Orb of the Firmament
effect: This powerful orb causes hero's air spells to inflict an additional 50% damage

name: Orb of Driving Rain
effect: This powerful orb causes hero's water spells to inflict an additional 50% damage

name: Orb of Tempestuous Fire
effect: This powerful orb causes hero's fire spells to inflict an additional 50% damage

name: Tome of Earth
effect: This heavy book contains all spells in the School of Earth Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available

name: Tome of Air
effect: This heavy book contains all spells in the School of Air Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available

name: Tome of Water
effect: This heavy book contains all spells in the School of Water Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available

name: Tome of Fire
effect: This heavy book contains all spells in the School of Fire Magic. It must be equipped for the spells to be available

name: Sphere of Permanence
effect: Wielding this sphere renders your units immune to the dispel magic spell

name: Orb of Inhibition
effect: This powerful orb prevents all spell casting in combat

name: Orb of Vulnerability
effect: During combat, this orb negates the natural magic resistance of all creatures on the battlefield

name: Bird of Perception
effect: This figurine increases hero's eagle eye skill by 5%

name: Stoic Watchman
effect: This figurine increases your eagle eye skill by 10%

name: Emblem of Cognizance
effect: This item increases hero's eagle eye skill by 15%

name: Clover of Fortune
effect: The Clover of Fortune increases hero's luck by +1

name: Ladybird of Luck
effect: The Ladybird of Luck increases hero's Luck by +1

name: Cards of Prophecy
effect: The Cards of Prophecy increase hero's luck by +1

name: Hourglass of the Evil Hour
effect: This item negates all luck bonuses during combat for both you and your opponent

name: Glyph of Gallantry
effect: The Glyph of Gallantry increases hero's morale by +1

name: Crest of Valor
effect: The Crest of Valor increases hero's morale by +1

name: Badge of Courage
effect: When equipped, The Badge of Courage increases hero's morale by +1. It also gives immunity to mind spells, although the effect is not in the artifact's description

name: Spirit of Oppression
effect: This item negates all morale bonuses during combat for both you and your opponent

name: Spyglass
effect: The Spyglass increases your scouting radius by +1

name: Speculum
effect: The Speculum increases hero's scouting radius by +1

name: Golden Bow
effect: When wielded, the Golden Bow allows hero's ranged troops to shoot through any obstacle or at any range without penalty
